title: XC6220D501PR__TOREX_0_alldatasheet
description: Voltage regulator with various configurations for CE pull-down resistor and C L auto discharge.
chunks:
["## ■ PIN ASSIGNMENT

---

| PIN NUMBER   | PIN NUMBER   | PIN NUMBER   | PIN NAME   | FUNCTIONS      |
|--------------|--------------|--------------|------------|----------------|
| SOT-25       | SOT-89-5     | USP-6C       | PIN NAME   | FUNCTIONS      |
| 3            | 1            | 3            | CE         | ON/OFF Control |
| 1            | 4            | 6 & 5        | V IN       | Power Input    |
| 2            | 2            | 4            | V SS       | Ground         |
| 5            | 5            | 1 & 2        | V OUT      | Output         |
| 4            | 3            | -            | NC         | No connection  |

---
## ● Selection Guide

---

| PRODUCT NAME   | CONDITIONS                                                              |
|----------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| XC6220A        | without CE Pull-down resistor, without C L auto discharge (Semi-custom) |
| XC6220B        | without CE Pull-down resistor, with C L auto discharge (Standard)       |
| XC6220C        | with CE Pull-down resistor, without C L auto discharge (Semi-custom)    |
| XC6220D        | with CE Pull-down resistor, with C L auto discharge (Semi-custom)       |

---
## ● Ordering Information

---

| DESIGNATOR   | DESCRIPTION               | SYMBOL   | DESCRIPTION                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|--------------|---------------------------|----------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| ①            | Type of CE                | A        | without CE Pull-down resistor, without C L discharge (Semi-custom)                                                                                                                                            |
| ①            | Type of CE                | B        | without CE Pull-down resistor, with C L discharge (Standard)                                                                                                                                                  |
| ①            | Type of CE                | C        | with CE Pull-down resistor, without C L discharge (Semi-custom)                                                                                                                                               |
| ①            | Type of CE                | D        | with CE Pull-down resistor, with C L discharge (Semi-custom)                                                                                                                                                  |
| ② ③          | Output Voltage            | 08~50    | e.g. 3.0V → ① =3, ② =0                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| ④            | Output Voltage Accuracy   | 1        | Output voltage { ○○ . 0v} (the 2 nd decimal place is '0') :HS Mode Accuracy ± 1%(V OUT(T) ≧ 2.1V), within 0.02V (V OUT(T) ≦ 2.0V) :PS Mode Accuracy ± 2%(V OUT(T) ≧ 2.1V), within 0.04V (V OUT(T) ≦ 2.0V)     |
| ④            | Output Voltage Accuracy   | B        | Output voltage { ○○ . 5v} (the 2 nd decimal place is '5') :HS Mode Accuracy ± 1%(V OUT(T) ≧ 2.05V), within 0.02V (V OUT(T) ≦ 1.95V) :PS Mode Accuracy ± 2%(V OUT(T) ≧ 2.05V), within 0.04V (V OUT(T) ≦ 1.95V) |
| ⑤⑥ - ⑦       | Packages Taping Type (*2) | MR       | SOT-25                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| ⑤⑥ - ⑦       | Packages Taping Type (*2) | MR-G     | SOT-25 (Halogen & Antimony free)                                                                                                                                                                              |
| ⑤⑥ - ⑦       | Packages Taping Type (*2) | PR       | SOT-89-5                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| ⑤⑥ - ⑦       | Packages Taping Type (*2) | PR-G     | SOT-89-5 (Halogen & Antimony free)                                                                                                                                                                            |
| ⑤⑥ - ⑦       | Packages Taping Type (*2) | ER       | USP-6C                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| ⑤⑥ - ⑦       | Packages Taping Type (*2) | ER-G     | USP-6C (Halogen & Antimony free)                                                                                                                                                                              |

---
## ■ ABSOLUTE MAXIMUM RATINGS

---

| PARAMETER                   | PARAMETER                   | SYMBOL   | RATINGS                     |
|-----------------------------|-----------------------------|----------|-----------------------------|
| Input Voltage               | Input Voltage               | V IN     | 6.5                         |
| Output Current (*1)         | Output Current (*1)         | I OUT    | 1400                        |
| Output Voltage              | Output Voltage              | V OUT    | V SS -0.3 ~ V IN +0.3       |
| CE Input Voltage            | CE Input Voltage            | V CE     | V SS -0.3 ~ 6.5             |
|                             | SOT-25                      | Pd       | 250                         |
|                             |                             | Pd       | 600 （ PCB mounted ） (*2)  |
|                             | SOT-89-5                    | Pd       | 500                         |
|                             |                             | Pd       | 1300 （ PCB mounted         |
|                             | USP-6C                      | Pd       | 120                         |
|                             |                             | Pd       | 1000 （ PCB mounted ） (*2) |
| Operating Temperature Range | Operating Temperature Range | Topr     | - 40 ~ + 85                 |
| Storage Temperature Range   | Storage Temperature Range   | Tstg     | - 55 ~ + 125                |

["## ■ PIN ASSIGNMENT

---

|--------------|--------------|--------------|------------|----------------|
| SOT-25       | SOT-89-5     | USP-6C       | PIN NAME   | FUNCTIONS      |
| 3            | 1            | 3            | CE         | ON/OFF Control |
| 1            | 4            | 6 & 5        | V IN       | Power Input    |
| 2            | 2            | 4            | V SS       | Ground         |
| 5            | 5            | 1 & 2        | V OUT      | Output         |
| 4            | 3            | -            | NC         | No connection  |

## ● Selection Guide

---

| PRODUCT NAME   | CONDITIONS                                                              |
|----------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| XC6220A        | without CE Pull-down resistor, without C L auto discharge (Semi-custom) |
| XC6220B        | without CE Pull-down resistor, with C L auto discharge (Standard)       |
| XC6220C        | with CE Pull-down resistor, without C L auto discharge (Semi-custom)    |
| XC6220D        | with CE Pull-down resistor, with C L auto discharge (Semi-custom)       |
